description: Erection of 2no rear dormer roof extensions; with chimney stack removal and installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Associated changes to fenestration

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Name: Water Supply Line South

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The proposed erection of 2no rear dormer roof extensions; with chimney stack removal and the installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion and associated changes to fenestration fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B, C & G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

The application form is for prior approval for rear extension, whereas the proposed floor plans and elevations have loft extension also. Please amend the drawings and application form with correct information.Note: Loft conversion cannot be done in Prior Approval Application.
